title: Can it be correctly stated that truth dawns upon the mind wiped clean of all beliefs? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you wipe your mind of all beliefs, you have nothing to build on for your model of understanding. Any theory of reality has to be built on observations of the real world, linked together with logical inferences. The difficult part is in evaluating each link in your model, and figuring out which are not actually grounded in observations.
